#include<stdio.h>
long long int inline inp()
{
	long long int n=0;
	char c=getchar_unlocked();
	while(c < '0' || c >'9') {c=getchar_unlocked();}
	while(c>='0' && c<='9')
	{
		n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0';
		c=getchar_unlocked();
	}
	return n;
}
int main()
{
	long long int t,n;
	t=inp();
	while(t--)
	{
		n=inp();
		if(n==1)
			printf("%d\n",0);
		else
		{
			if(n&1)
				printf("%lld\n",(long long int)(((n/2)*(n+1))-1));
			else
				printf("%lld\n",(long long int)(((n/2)*n)-1));
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
